casebody.data:
SAC AND FOX NATION OF OKLOHAMA, et al., petitioners,
v.
BOROUGH OF JIM THORPE, PENNSYLVANIA, et al. No. 14-1419. Supreme Court of the United States Oct. 5, 2015.

Motion of Senator Ben Nighthorse Campbell, et al. for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Motion of National Congress of American Indians for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit denied.
